verse: This is the word of the Lord that came to Jeremiah concerning the drought.

header: Jeremiah’s Prayers and the Lord’s Answers

verse: This is what the Lord says concerning this people.
The Lord told me, “Do not pray for the well-being of these people.

Even if they fast, I will not listen to their cries for help. Even if they sacrifice burnt offerings and grain offerings, I will not accept them. Instead, I will finish them off with sword, famine, and plague.”
Then I said, “But, Lord God, the prophets keep telling them, ‘You will not see sword or famine. I will give you lasting peace in this place.’”
Then the Lord said this to me:
